channel.title: Monitoring on AWS System Manager
channel.description: Recent content in Monitoring on AWS System Manager

item.title: 7.1. RDS Alarms (CPU & Free Storage)
item.description: CloudWatch → Alarms → Create alarm Metric CPUUtilization (Per-Database → select DB) → Period 1m → Greater/Equal 1 → Notification SNS dr-alerts → Name: rds-cpu-high-test Metric FreeStorageSpace → Lower/Equal 5 GiB → Name: rds-free-storage-low

item.title: 7.2. Alarm for Lambda DR Test
item.description: CloudWatch → Alarms → Create alarm → Lambda / By function name → metric Errors → Period 1m → Greater/Equal 1 → SNS dr-alerts → Name: lambda-dr-errors. Test: Go to Lambda → Test with event { "forceSnapshotId": "does-not-exist" } to trigger an error → the alarm will go into ALARM state and send an email.
